attributes.action: Increase the National Speed Limit for Motorcycles by 10mph
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Motorcycles use less space, cause less congestion and use less resources than a car, and therefore should be encouraged. 

Increasing their permitted speed will allow motorcycles to legitimately and safely escape from the confines of the convoys of slower-moving vehicles,  thereby reducing the length of the convoy and improving the situation for all road users.
